import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Airports from './Airports' export default function EditFlightx() { const parameter = useParams() const [flight, setFlight] = useState({ id:'', aircraft_iata:'', airline_iata:'', airline_name:'', flight_status:'', flight_date:'', // segments: { // airport: '', // city:'', // country:'', // iata: '', // lat: '', // lng: '', // segment_order: undefined, // segment_type: '' // }, dep_id:'', dep_airport: '', dep_city: '', dep_country: '', dep_iata: '', dep_lat: '', dep_lng: '', dep_segment_order: undifiened, dep_segment_type: '', arr_id: '', arr_airport: '', arr_city: '', arr_country: '', arr_iata: '', arr_lat: '', arr_lng: '', arr_segment_order: undifiened, arr_segment_type: '' }) // const [segment, setSegment] = useState({ // airport:'', // city:'', // country:'', // iata: '', // lat: '', // lng: '', // segment_order: undefined, // segment_type: '' // }) // Get Airports from flight microservice useEffect (() => { axios.get("http://localhost:8082/v1/flights/"+ parameter.id) .then( res => { console.log(res.data) setFlight({ id: res.data.id, aircraft_iata: res.data.aircraft_iata, airline_iata:res.data.airline_iata, airline_name:res.data.airline_name, flight_status:res.data.flight_status, flight_date:res.data.flight_date, // segment.airport:res.data. // stegment[0]?.airport:res.data.segments[0].airport dep_id:res.data.segments[0].id, dep_airport:res.data.segments[0].airport, dep_airport: '', dep_city: '', dep_country: '', dep_iata: '', dep_lat: '', dep_lng: '', dep_segment_order: undefined, dep_segment_type: '', arr_id: res.data.segments[1].id, arr_airport: res.data.segments[1].airport, arr_city: '', arr_country: '', arr_iata: '', arr_lat: '', arr_lng: '', arr_segment_order: 0, arr_segment_type: '' }) console.log(flight.segments) } ) },[]) const content =

Update Flight

setFlight({id:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.id)}} />
setFlight({aircraft_iata:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.aircraft_iata)}} />
setFlight({airline_iata:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.airline_iata)}} />
setFlight({airline_name:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.airline_name)}} />
setFlight({flight_date:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.flight_date)}} />
setFlight({flight_status:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.flight_status)}} />
setFlight({dep_airport:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.flight_status)}} />
     
return (
{content}
) }
